data.title: Environmental Health Coordinators
data.meta_description: Directory of VA Environmental Health Coordinators by state
data.text:
Below is a directory of VA Environmental Health Coordinators by state and U.S. territory. The directory contains the latest information received from VA health care facilities and is updated as changes occur. Veterans may contact their local VA Environmental Health Coordinator about in-person registry evaluations or health concerns related to military exposures.

Learn about the privacy policy for environmental health registry evaluations. You may also wish to see the directory for the lead Environmental Health Coordinator in each Veterans Integrated Service Network (VISN ).

Please do not include personally identifiable information (PII) in an email to VA Environmental Health Coordinators beyond your name and telephone number. PII is any information about an individual, such as social security number or medical history, that can be used to distinguish or trace an individualâ€™s identity.
